named-query.name: applicationParameter.byApplication
named-query.query: SELECT ap FROM ApplicationParameter ap WHERE ap.application.id = :idAplication

named-query.name: cluster.findByUser
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Cluster c WHERE c.user.id = :username

named-query.name: job.findByUser
named-query.query: SELECT j FROM Job j WHERE j.user.id = :username

named-query.name: instanceType.findAllByProvider
named-query.query: SELECT it FROM InstanceType it WHERE it.cloudprovider.id = :idProvider

named-query.name: userInstances.findByUser
named-query.query: SELECT ui FROM UserInstance ui WHERE ui.cluster.user.id = :username

named-query.name: userInstances.findByUserCluster
named-query.query: SELECT ui FROM UserInstance ui WHERE ui.cluster.user.id = :username and ui.cluster.id = :clusterId
